item.title: Ongoing daily fly tipping, 28th October
item.description:
Hackney council come and collect items every morning, but that has caused the problem to get worse - now people drive to dump their rubbish here because it gets cleared. Please put up a sign with a penalty charge notice to stop this practice
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Manor Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Street lights not working and it’s very dark, 28th October
item.description:
The street light on Mottingham Road SE9 4SL near house 130 are not working. This is a Main Street and it’s very dark with fast vehicles passing all the time. There is risk of drivers not being able to see pedestrians. Please can street lights be fixed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 158, Mottingham Road, Coldharbour, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leafs, 28th October
item.description:
This is now a hazard right outside of our house. We have a new born baby. With the rain this has now become slippery. I have reported this last week and no action was taken. This needs to be cleared immediately as it is now a risk for us to leave our house.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Wickham Lane, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet
